item.title: Ancient Magic
item.dc:creator: @coolcool coolcool
item.description:
@coolcool wrote:

add a case then add this… like this for example ( im making up case numbers… )

                                               case 123535:
			emotes = 2;
			updateRequired = true;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
			sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic.");
			}
			else if (objectID == 9946 && emotes == 2)
			{
			emotes = 0;
			updateRequired = true;
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
			sendMessage("You convert to normal magic.");
			}
                            break;

item.title: Ancient Magic
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Ok instead of making it where you click on a object to change it, I want to make it where you click on a item and it changes it. (I know where to add it)

This is the code for clicking on a object and changing it

if (objectID == 9946 && emotes == 0 || emotes == 1) { emotes = 2; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); sendMessage("You convert to ancient magic."); } else if (objectID == 9946 && emotes == 2) { emotes = 0; updateRequired = true; setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); sendMessage("You convert to normal magic."); } break;

I hope this is unlike all the other my other posts in this section that have no success of getting anyone to post.

Read full topic
